answer:
ImmunizeBC is an immunization resource for members of the public, not health care workers. You can find some of the information that you are seeking in the Canadian Immunization Guide. Each vaccine lists immunizing agents available for use in Canada. 
Immunization Nurse
question: I have questions about the vaccines used in Canada. I have a family that doesn't want to use US vaccines, due to religious concerns/porcine gelatin.
